comments.text:
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.0.1) Gecko/20060111 Firefox/1.5.0.1 Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.0.1) Gecko/20060111 Firefox/1.5.0.1 I created a table with a css page linked in. The image is linked inside of two tables with alignment set to top. The image is linked with no specific class . The css file has for the link a reference to vertical-align: top The image then show approximately 100 pixels above the position where it should be contained in the table cell. See additional information for html and css file. Reproducible: Always Steps to Reproduce: 1. css file has an anchor referece which has a vertical-align: top value in it 2. the images is embedded in two tables and linked 3. Actual Results: Image 100 px above the cell. Expected Results: Image still contained in the cell with top alignment. ##Html File #### Web Team Project Portal
Home Browse News FAQ's Submit Items Contact
Ingenix.com
Description:Portal for ingenix
Purpose:Direct customers to resources
Alternate Applications:None
Contact Person:Kirk Flowers
IET Portal
Description:Portal for managing content and form submission.
Purpose:Display content
Alternate Applications:Other departments
Contact Person:Bill Barber
IngenixOnline.com
Description:Main interface for customers to order ingenix supplies
Purpose:Ordering media from ingenix
Alternate Applications:e-commerce site.
Contact Person:Jason Bosarge
i3 DLN
Description:Content site for i3
Purpose:Distributing of content
Alternate Applications:any i3 site
Contact Person:Kirk Flowers
Contact Webmaster
###End HTML### ###CS File #### .body { font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans serif; font-size: 11px; } table { } td { font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, san serif; color: #151520; font-size: 11px; } a { font-weight: normal; font-size: 12px; color: #413E56; vertical-align: top; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, san serif; text-decoration: none; } a:hover{ font-weight: normal; font-size: 12px; color: #549BF2; vertical-align: top; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, san serif; text-decoration: none; } b { font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, san serif; font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold; } th { font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, san serif; font-weight: bold; font-size: 11px; text-transform: capitalize; text-align: left; vertical-align: top; color: #4B4B76 } form { font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, san serif; font-size: 13px; color: #151620; } input { font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, san serif; font-size: 13px; color: #151620; } textarea { font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, san serif; font-size: 13px; color: #151620; } select { font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, san serif; font-size: 13px; color: #151620; } ul { font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, san serif; font-size: 13px; list-style-type: circle; list-style-position: outside; color: #4B4B76 } li { font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, san serif; font-size: 13px; color: #151620; } ol { font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, san serif; font-size: 13px; list-style-type: upper-alpha; list-style-position: outside; color: #4B4B76 } h1 { font-size: 18px; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Sans-Serif; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: none; color: #323548; } ###End CS File
